xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/980932-Claude Miller, cinéaste de l'intime, ou Claude M le cinéma 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4K7iumVccScdjPHvpvYa2x3P0G4.jpg Since childhood, Claude Miller was mad about movies. From a cinephile he became a filmmaker, a craftsman of "mainstream auteur cinema " believing in the sensitivity and imagination of the viewer. Suggesting the most, while showing the least possible, his work is of an elegant modesty. Claude Miller, cinéaste de l'intime, ou Claude M le cinéma
